about_the_game:
bullet rain


Incessant attacks will leave you trapped not knowing what to do.
Will his strategies be able to overcome the absolute combat power of his enemy's troops?

Frantic Combat


In this combat, keep in mind that the opponent will spare no efforts to eliminate you.
Make this adventure very exciting, keeping moving, to stay alive, only with strategies will you succeed.

Cyber Dungeon: Excalibur


Cyber Dungeon: Excalibur is a rogue-like game in which you'll have to deal with a large amount of enemies and a suppression of bullets from all sides, in addition to having to be careful where you're going and where you are, so you don't end up getting lost in the levels and getting trapped in a dead end.

Cyber Dungeon: Excalibur


Cyber Dungeon: Excalibur is a rogue-like game in which you'll have to deal with a large amount of enemies and a suppression of bullets from all sides, in addition to having to be careful where you're going and where you are, so you don't end up getting lost in the levels and getting trapped in a dead end.
legal_notice:
By accepting these privacy terms, I agree to the terms described below:

We use the personal data provided in the game, or provided in steam.

For people with health problems, the game can cause strong emotions, the lights can cause nausea, dizziness, convulsions or loss of consciousness, be aware that if you find yourself in this situation, you may have one of these problems, if you play anyway we are not responsible by the consequences.

We at Kitsune Studios are not responsible for machine problems that occur while the program is running.

Resale in any other store is not permitted.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux/SteamOS
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: mono
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux/SteamOS
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 5.1

name: Cyber Dungeon: Excalibur

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: mono

Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 5.1

short_description: Cyber Dungeon: Excalibur, brings fun and an action-adventure experience with frantic combat, hail of bullets and robots. Can you stay alive until the end?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Czech, Ukrainian, Arabic, Persian
